main.title: Rent an E-Bike in Berlin
main.description: We’ve got Berlin’s biggest selection of e-bikes and pedelecs for rent. Test one for a half day, full day, or even a week! Simply join the listnride community and book yours today.

featured.title: Featured E-Bikes
featured.description: These are our most popular e-bikes for rent. Book yours now!

more.title: More E-Bikes and Pedelecs
more.description: Here's some more of our community's favourites.

selection.title: See our full selection of E-Bikes and Pedelecs for rent here:
selection.description:
E-Bikes can be the perfect option for the urban commuter. But for some, it’s simply too imprudent to make a significant investment without trying it out first. That’s where the listnride bike sharing community can help. With our selection of e-bikes and pedelecs for rent, you can test various models before you buy.
E-Bikes are also great for renting while visiting Berlin. You can cover a lot more ground in a day - with a lot less effort - on an e-bike. 
Our community offers e-bikes and pedelecs from leading brands such as Ampler, Gazelle, Coboc, Cortina, Haibike, Smart, GoCycle, and Vello! Rent one today - they're available in Mitte near Alexanderplatz, in Prenzlauerberg, Kreuzberg, and throughout the city!

related.title: People in Berlin also rented Road Bikes
related.description: We've got a great selection of high end road bikes available for you.

meta_data.title: E-Bike Rentals in Berlin - Book a Test Ride
meta_data.description: Test ride an E-Bike or Pedelec. Berlin’s biggest selection of e-bikes and pedelecs available for rent on listnride.com. Sign up and book yours today!
